TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit TablePattern/TablePatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.
Gets the total number of columns in a table.
Docs.value: The total number of columns in a table. The default value is zero.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern> object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern> property values.
[!code-csharp[UIATablePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATablePattern_snip/CSharp/UIATablePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATablePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATablePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATablePattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetColumnHeaders() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a collection of s representing all the column headers in a table.
Docs.returns: A collection of s. The default is an empty array.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, the row or column header is retrieved for a specific table item.
For the purposes of this example, a relationship between the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation.RowOrColumnMajor%2A> property and the row and column header items is demonstrated. However, a table can have row and column headers regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation.RowOrColumnMajor%2A> property of the table.
[!code-csharp[UIATablePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATablePattern_snip/CSharp/UIATablePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATablePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATablePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATablePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

Docs.summary: Retrieves a collection of s representing all the row headers in a table.
Docs.returns: A collection of s. The default is an empty array.

For the purposes of this example, a relationship between the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation.RowOrColumnMajor%2A> property and the row and column header items is demonstrated.
